results.content:
The worst experience and course I've ever had on Udemy! 
Wasting of time, absolute disappointment.
If you just go over the V5 introduction yourself you will end up with better understanding and knowledge about Bootstrap 5.
Not to even mention you will hear every 5 mins. "Okay, okay, okay, I think we got a problem"  and sometimes he will even be like "I think it's okay, let just leave it"
Wait to get to the Sass part in the end and just get even more confused if you already know how to work with Sass...
I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS COURSE. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY.

response.content: Thank you for your feedback. We apology that you find the course unhelpful and promise that we will improve it in the next update
response.content_html: Thank you for your feedback. We apology that you find the course unhelpful and promise that we will improve it in the next update
